resources.string: Are you sure to quit the game?

Recursive, the Viking, descends from a huge line of hunters of SlimeMuzos. Help him eliminate all possible SliMuzos. 

A Cermuzo once said, the recursion is wonderful.

That is the reason why my parents called me that name.

 - Recursive, the viking.

The SliMuzos are a race created by the wise sorcerers Cermuzos many years ago. \n\nThey are gel, elusive and somewhat silly, but their evolution allowed the Cermuzos to reproduce their fanaticism towards Michael Jackson, so the SliMuzos sometimes make a moonwalk while they walk.

You are locked in a dungeon, you only have three options, two of them is running side by side like a programmer running from a NullPointerException. \n\nIf you press left, you will go to the left, and if you press right, then to the right.

You have another option, jump and dodge the SliMuzos, they are idiots, they dont know what it is to jump and they try to imitate you when they collide with the wall, yet they are not able to predict your agile movement. \n\nI have nothing left but to teach you about movements, eliminate them all with your damn sword you son of a beach.
